alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 10:26PM EDT until July 24 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1026 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ashtabula, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Girard, North Kingsville, Albion, Lake City, Kingsville, Conneautville, Cranesville, Springboro, Platea, Edgewood, Plymouth Center and Kelloggsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
